description: This file defines and configures multiple Azure OpenAI agents with specific tools, roles, and behaviors, and sets up a playground for testing these agents within a web application.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific tools, instructions, and configuration.

classes.name: AzureOpenAI
classes.description: Represents the Azure OpenAI model used by agents.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Sets up a testing environment for multiple agents and provides a web app interface.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent data in a SQLite database.

classes.name: DalleTools
classes.description: Provides image generation capabilities using DALL-E.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Provides web search capabilities via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: ExaTools
classes.description: Provides specialized search and research capabilities.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Provides access to financial data and analysis.

classes.name: YouTubeTools
classes.description: Provides tools for analyzing YouTube videos.

methods.name: serve_playground_app
methods.description: Starts the web server for the playground application.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Retrieves the web application instance for the playground.
